TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FlowControl extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供服務給 Visual Basic 編譯器來編譯 和 迴圈。

span.span: Provides services to the Visual Basic compiler for compiling and loops.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別支援 Visual Basic 編譯器，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This class supports the Visual Basic compiler and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
